snippet: Tim Pernetti, the former Rutgers athletic director, discussed the tension between running an athletic business inside an educational institution at a New York University Sports & Society program in November, saying the “human capital” in the...
abstract: Tim Pernetti, the former Rutgers athletic director, discussed the tension between running an athletic business inside an educational institution at a New York University Sports & Society program in November, saying the “human capital” in the department is what can be controlled.

headline.main: As Panelist, Ex-Athletic Director Stressed Responsibility

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
